title: Whittier Tech Students AttendNetworking Event, Learn About Job Opportunities at Portsmouth NavalShipyard - John Guilfoil Public Relations LLC
content: Whittier Tech Students AttendNetworking Event, Learn About Job Opportunities at Portsmouth NavalShipyard  John Guilfoil Public Relations LLC
description: HAVERHILL – Superintendent Maureen Lynch is pleased to announce that Whittier Tech students got a glimpse of what it is like working at the Portsmouth Naval Shipyard (PNS) at a networking event earlier this month.
